Devil's Swords

Version 1.0.0

The time of enlightenment and knowledge is past. Ignorance grips the land. An ancient force from the time of Adam (on whom be peace), powerless for centuries, arises once more, and strikes. Unable to defend themselves, unable to even identify the source of their peril, the people fall prey to it. Corruption spreads. Cities fall. Civilizations crumble. The excuses rise once more.
